text: In the abandoned house, shadows danced around him as cold whispers echoed. Suddenly, a pair of blood-soaked hands reached out from the darkness, claiming him forever.
In a small town, an African American man moved into a house with a dark history. The haunting whispered his name, leaving him in an endless nightmare.
As the moonlight cast eerie shadows, he heard whispers in the night. But no matter how he ran, the echoes of hate followed, echoing from the depths of ignorance.
